price: 97. Dheh: “Rabbiyow! Waxaan kaa magan gali waswaasinta shayaadiinta.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
